title: Online Science Education Course Design Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Process for professionals (medical/legal/technical) to acquire science curriculum knowledge for guiding elementary school children, conducted as non-real-time online learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% science concept comprehension by utilizing gamification elements (experience points, badges, leaderboards, etc.).
Learners maintain over 75% weekly quest (mission) completion rates to sustain continuous learning engagement.
Over 70% of learners complete project assignments demonstrating scientific problem-solving skills in the final summative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
